title: 423: Dr. Andrew Hill on the Brain, Sugar, Cholesterol, Pre-Workout Supplements, Nootropics, Addiction, Bacon & More
description: In this episode, Sal, Adam & Justin have a very engaging interview Dr. Andrew Hill, neuroscientist and Founder @PeakBrainLA, Lead Neuroscientist @truBrain, Lecturer @UCLA, Entrepreneur, Scientist, & Explorer. Have Sal, Adam & Justin personally train you with a new video on our new YouTube channel, Mind Pump TV. Be sure to Subscribe for updates. Add to the incredible brain enhancing effect of Kimera Koffee with www.brain.fm/mindpump 10 Free sessions! Music for the brain for incredible focus, sleep and naps!
